title: Clash
body: What’s the nz time for clash?

replies.body:
Lock-in starts at 7pm AEST Friday (tonight), which I believe is 9pm NZT.

Cheers
Mindstar
Lol discard my message I’m living in the past haha thinking it’s thursday today hahaha
Wait I thought it said Friday which is tomorrow oh shizzle nuggets, thanks!
